title: Custom Harley Davidson Serial 1 MOSH/CHOPPER e-bike debuts at Sturgis motorcycle rally
content:
This gorgeous, one-off Serial 1 MOSH Chopper e-bike is a full custom throwback, and it’s on auction right now after being introduced at the annual Sturgis Motorcycle Rally in South Dakota. The 1-of-1 bike is a unique spin on their Mosh cruiser e-bike, which is in the current lineup from the brand. The retro, 60’s […]

The post Custom Harley Davidson Serial 1 MOSH/CHOPPER e-bike debuts at Sturgis motorcycle rally appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
